org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.vectors

Class SplitInfo<D extends RegionInfo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.vectors.SplitInfo<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Class representing information of left and right subregions.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoricalSplitInfo, ContinuousSplitInfo

    public abstract class SplitInfo<D extends RegionInfo>
extends Object
    Class encapsulating information about the split.
